verses.name: Jeremiah 4:13
verses.text: Behold, he shall come up as clouds, and his chariots shall be as a whirlwind: his horses are swifter than eagles. Woe unto us! for we are spoiled.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:14
verses.text: O Jerusalem, wash thine heart from wickedness, that thou mayest be saved. How long shall thy vain thoughts lodge within thee?

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:15
verses.text: For a voice declareth from Dan, and publisheth affliction from mount Ephraim.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:16
verses.text: Make ye mention to the nations; behold, publish against Jerusalem, that watchers come from a far country, and give out their voice against the cities of Judah.
